item.title: Chapter 2 - Data Visualization
item.description: R4DS Chapter Summary ggplot2 implements grammer of graphics First Steps Inspect penguins # trusting it is a tibble and thus not worrying about flooding the output penguins ## # A tibble: 344 Ã— 8 ## species island bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm body_mass_g ## <fct> <fct> <dbl> <dbl> <int> <int> ## 1 Adelie Torgersen 39.1 18.7 181 3750 ## 2 Adelie Torgersen 39.5 17.4 186 3800 ## 3 Adelie Torgersen 40.3 18 195 3250 ## 4 Adelie Torgersen NA NA NA NA ## 5 Adelie Torgersen 36.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
